concept.title: Draw circle and ellipses
concept.shortdesc: There are separate tools for circle drawing and ellipse drawing, but they follow similar behaviour

section.p: Use the circle tool for when you require a perfect circle, with a constrained radius. Use the ellipse tool when you require an irregular ellipse

ol.li: Select the Circle toolor the Ellipse tool

Do one of the following
Move your mouse to where you want the centre of the circle/ellipse to be and then start dragging away from this point.
Click where you want the centre of a circle/ellipse to be, a new object is created with the dimension of the previous circle/ellipse created. (or 100 radius by default)
